page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF(cont.d)
page.content: Toby had yoghurt. We sat at tables of eight. Andrea sat next to her friend Belinda. Sarah had sandwiches. We played in the playground until 1.00p.m We came in and carried on with our work until 2.15p.m.and had another break. We played Bulldogs again. We went back into the classroom and did athletics. At 3.15 p.m.it was time for house assembly and then it was home time. Toby stayed behind for cricket practice. Andrea and Sarah rode home and Andrea played at Sarah's. When Toby got home he watched T.V then had his tea- he had spaghetti on toast. He watched T.V until 9.30p.m.then went to bed. Sarah had her tea which was salad and then watched T.V until 9.30p.m. Andrea came home from Sarah's and had her tea. She had salad and watched T.V until 9.30p.m.and then went to bed.
